order.one: SELECT * FROM  `order` WHERE id=?;SELECT * FROM `order_details` WHERE order_id = ?

user.all: SELECT u.id, u.name, u.email, c.name as 'company_name', p.name as 'profile_name', u.created, u.updated, u1.name as 'created_by_name', u2.name as 'updated_by_name' FROM `user` as u INNER JOIN `company` as c ON u.company_id = c.id INNER JOIN `profile` as p ON u.profile_id = p.id INNER JOIN `user` u1 ON u.created_by = u1.id LEFT OUTER JOIN `user` u2 ON u.updated_by = u2.id;

category.all: SELECT c.id, c.name, c.code, co.name as 'company_name', u1.name as 'created_by_name', u2.name as 'updated_by_name', c.created, c.updated FROM `category` as c INNER JOIN `company` as co ON c.company_id = co.id INNER JOIN `user` u1 ON c.created_by = u1.id LEFT OUTER JOIN `user` u2 ON c.updated_by = u2.id;

company.all: SELECT c.id, c.name, c.contact, c.address, c.email, c.created, c.updated, u1.name as 'created_by_name', u2.name as 'updated_by_name' FROM `company` as c INNER JOIN `user` u1 ON c.created_by = u1.id LEFT OUTER JOIN `user` u2 ON c.updated_by = u2.id;

inventory.all: SELECT i.id, i.quantity, s.name as 'store_name', p.name as 'product_name', c.name as 'company_name', u1.name as 'created_by_name', u2.name as 'updated_by_name', i.created, i.updated FROM `inventory` as i INNER JOIN `store` as s ON i.store_id = s.id INNER JOIN `product` as p ON i.product_id = i.id INNER JOIN `company` as c ON i.company_id = c.id INNER JOIN `user` u1 ON i.created_by = u1.id LEFT OUTER JOIN `user` u2 ON i.updated_by = u2.id;
